org.openrdf.sail.lucene3

Class LuceneIndexNIOFS

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openrdf.sail.lucene.AbstractSearchIndex
      • org.openrdf.sail.lucene.AbstractLuceneIndex
        • org.openrdf.sail.lucene3.LuceneIndex
          • org.openrdf.sail.lucene3.LuceneIndexNIOFS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchIndex
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class LuceneIndexNIOFS
extends LuceneIndex
    LuceneIndex which uses a NIOFSDirectory instead of MMapDirectory to avoid the JVM crash (see http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8224843/jvm-crashes-on-lucene-datainput- readvint).
    Author:
    andriy.nikolov
